original_title: Love Stories: The Best from Dolphin
overview: Dolphin Entertainment proudly presents Love Stories: The Best from Dolphin. Here are the best scenes from various films, including First Time 6 which features charming Artem and gorgeous Yanis; Young & Innocent 2 with very hot and beautiful blond Denis and stunning Artem; The Tender Age 2 with sexy Ivan and virgin Andrey (where he experienced his first time); and Maric's Weekend with one of the very first Dolphin models Yuriy Boshkin and pretty boy Ludvig. There are also two more fabulous scenes that never have been seen before, one with star Sasha Leskov and Cheslav, the other featuring sweet Artem Kozirev and Danny.
title: Love Stories: The Best from Dolphin
